title: Ticket #2887: Collector leaks sockets, leaves them in CLOSE_WAIT state
description:
Note this isn't in a released version of condor yet.

Reproduce by starting condor, wait a few seconds, note the number of sockets in CLAIM_WAIT state: 

$ netstat -a | grep CLOSE
tcp        1      0 chevre.cs.wisc.edu:4210     chevre.cs.wisc.edu:49000    CLOSE_WAIT
tcp        1      0 chevre.cs.wisc.edu:45677    chevre.cs.wisc.edu:49964    CLOSE_WAIT
tcp        1      0 chevre.cs.wisc.edu:45677    chevre.cs.wisc.edu:46637    CLOSE_WAIT
tcp        1      0 chevre.cs.wisc.edu:4210     chevre.cs.wisc.edu:33445    CLOSE_WAIT
tcp        1      0 chevre.cs.wisc.edu:45677    chevre.cs.wisc.edu:57458    CLOSE_WAIT

git bisect shows the bad commit is 

git bisect good
486eeed65a836c4fd6678768089ab258d641f744 is the first bad commit
